Rulings.Edison:
●Emissary of the Oasis' last sentence applies even when your opponent attacks with a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster; the Battle Damage to you becomes zero.
●If you have Emissary of the Oasis with Raregold Armor, and a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster, your opponent can't attack.
●A Monster Token is a Normal Monster, but a Ritual Monster without an effect is not a Normal Monster.

Rulings.Base: 1. The last sentence of "Emissary of the Oasis" applies even when your opponent attacks with a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster; the Battle Damage to you becomes zero.\n2. If you have "Emissary of the Oasis" with "Raregold Armor", and a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster, your opponent cannot attack.\n3. A Monster Token is a Normal Monster, but a Ritual Monster without an effect is not a Normal Monster.
